thread.title: ADVANCE SALES: Tickets available for Chucho Valdes concert
thread.title_full: ADVANCE SALES: Tickets available for Chucho Valdes concert

author: Staff report
title: ADVANCE SALES: Tickets available for Chucho Valdes concert
text: Posted Oct. 5, 2015 at 2:37 PM Updated at 4:00 PM Posted Oct. 5, 2015 at 2:37 PM Updated at 4:00 PM Holland, Mich. Tickets are available for the Chucho Valdés: Irakere 40 concert taking place Nov. 7 at Hope College. A five-time Grammy and three-time Latin Grammy-winning pianist, composer and bandleader, Jesús “Chucho” Valdés is also Irakere’s founder, main composer and arranger. The 2015 Chucho Valdés: Irakere 40 tour is a celebration of Irakere, the Cuban band who fuses Afro-Cuban ritual music, popular Afro-Cuban music styles, jazz and rock. The 7:30 p.m. concert will be in Dimnent Memorial Chapel. Tickets for the concert are $18 for regular admission, $13 for senior citizens and Hope faculty/staff, and $6 for children. Admission for Hope College students is free. Tickets are available at the ticket office in the Events and Conferences Office located downtown in the Anderson-Werkman Financial Center (100 E. Eighth St.). The office is open weekdays from 9 a.m. to 5 p.m. and can be called at (616) 395-7890. Tickets are also available online at hope.edu/tickets . By Staff report
